item.title: HP ACU cli quick guide
item.description: Guess what? Itâ€™s time for something different than powershell ðŸ˜› I finally got myself a server to play around with Hyper-V on. This has been sorely missed for a long time. I worked a lot with Hyper-V in my previous job, and even built a small data center running on Hyper-V. But at my current job we only use vmware, which is a great product but to expensive in my book.
